{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-07-15T14:47:53.000Z", "description": "

Hello,


Hope you are doing well.


We have urgent Machine Learning Engineer, it is a 100% remote role.


Machine Learning Engineer

100% remote


I am seeking a Machine Learning Engineer who designs and develops the platform and frameworks that facilitate automated data-driven decision-making, gathers data, and determines statistical algorithms and models that a system can use to learn from experience, predict outcomes and make decisions. This is a Senior level role that requires experience working on ML projects and experience with Azure as a data platform.


Hands on experience with Azure Machine Learning Studio, Automated ML, Designer, MLOps, Responsible ML is a big plus.
